input.sentences: the streets were busy with people !
people loved to shop the streets at night .
vendors had all of their items on display and ready for purchase .
the street was filled with packed vendors up and down the sidewalk .
it is fun to shop at night !
output.sentences: During the summer, the streets are busy with people in them until way past the bars call last calls.
The people roam the streets leisurely, looking for the occasional shop that is still open.
Even after the stores close there are vendors that stay open and ready to sell gifts and food to the tourists looking to purchase.
On the boardwalk, when the food vendors stay open late, the sidewalks full of people spill over into the street.
It's fun to shop late at night, even if sometimes I wonder what I was thinking the next day.
